titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Southern United States Manuscript Map Collection, 1850-1923 and undated RL.11492
titlestmt.author: Alice L. Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-10-18 09:11:16 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Southern United States manuscript map collection
did.abstract: Comprises 33 sketch maps of locations in Florida, Georgia, Louisiana, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, Virginia, and West Virginia. Includes a number of B. P. Baker Co. plats for a tract of land in Gates Co., N.C.; plans of subdivisions and improvements in Savannah by Percy Sugden; a map of Durham, N.C., in 1867 by Lewis Blount; a map of Mississippi representing Indian territories and missionary stations by Sarah Coffin; and a detailed plat of the Bennett & Wallace Lands in West Virginia. Maps signed by Robert Jayne, W. F. Brown, John Tebeau, and Ravenel Gignilliet are present. Primarily drawn ink on paper. Sizes of maps vary between 11x 14 cm. to 70 x 104 cm.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Southern United States Manuscript Map Collection was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a transfer in 1992.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Southern United States Manuscript Map Collection, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Comprises 33 sketch maps of locations in Florida, Georgia, Louisiana, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, Virginia, and West Virginia. Includes a number of B. P. Baker Co. plats for a tract of land in Gates Co., N.C.; plans of subdivisions and improvements in Savannah by Percy Sugden; a map of Durham, N.C., in 1867 by Lewis Blount; a map of Mississippi representing Indian territories and missionary stations by Sarah Coffin; and a detailed plat of the Bennett & Wallace Lands in West Virginia. Maps signed by Robert Jayne, W. F. Brown, John Tebeau, and Ravenel Gignilliet are present. Primarily drawn ink on paper. Sizes of maps vary between 11x 14 cm. to 70 x 104 cm.

did.unittitle: Florida
"Plan of Ravenswood Florida"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Plat representing lots as well as Lake Dorr and a railroad. Ink and watercolors on paper.

did.unittitle: Georgia
"Plan of Forty-five lots lying...Southeast of the City of Savannah...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tebeau, John. Plat in colored ink on paper.

did.unittitle: "Map representing that part of Bonaventure lying between Evergreen Cemetery [Chatham Co.]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tebeau, John R. Plat showing 23 lots. Colored ink and watercolors on linen. (Three copies, including the original.)

did.unittitle: "Plan of the Proposed Widening of that Portion of Waters Rd. [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Survey map. Note on verso. Ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "Plan Showing Encroachments Extending Beyond the Proposed Eastern Line of Waters Road [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Showing properties and electric railway, with notations. Colored ink on paper.

did.unittitle: "Plan of a portion of Anderson St. [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "Plan of subdivision of No. 3...belonging to the Merchants and Mechanics Land Co. [Savannah]."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Plat showing streets, roads, and railroads. Note on verso. Ink and watercolors on paper.

did.unittitle: "Plan of that portion of Tybee Island [Chatham Co.]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Plat showing lots as well as streets and waterways. Ink and watercolor on paper.

did.unittitle: "Plan of Subdivision No. 5 of the Merchants and Mechanics Land Co. [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Plat showing 11 lots as well as streets. Ink and watercolor on paper.

did.unittitle: "Plan of Subdivision No. 6 of the lands of the Merchants and Mechanics Land Co. [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Plat showing roads and streets, with notations. Ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "Dr. Falligant's Map of the Village of Eastland...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Brucker, E. "Dr. Falligant's Map of the Village of Eastlandâ€¦." Plat showing 378 lots on the southeast border of Savannah. Colored ink on paper reinforced with cloth.

did.unittitle: "Map showing Levy Avenue...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Brown, W. F. Depicts roads, hammocks, and a cemetery. Colored ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "Plan of a tract of land situate 3 miles from the City of Savannah...as surveyed for John C. Rowland, Esq."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sugden, Percy. Map showing waterways, roads, railway, and adjacent plantations as well as representing forests and fields. Ink and watercolors on paper reinforced with cloth.

did.unittitle: "Map of Henry Street East From Waters Road [Savannah]...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Brown, W. F. Ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "Plat of Portion of Rowland Tract Chatham Co. Ga. surveyed for M. H. Floyd Esq."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gignilliet, Ravenel. Colored ink on linen.

did.unittitle: Louisiana
Map primarily representing Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Borgne, the Gulf of Mexico....

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Map primarily representing Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Borgne, the Gulf of Mexico, and the Mississippi River as well as New Orleans and Biloxi. Colored ink on paper reinforced with cloth.

did.unittitle: Map of part of New Orleans showing plans of lands on Bayou St. and on Lake Pontchartrain

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Lands of Gentilly" (verso). Pencil and ink on paper.

did.unittitle: Mississippi
"Map of the District North of Aberdeen" (verso)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: De Saulles, A. B. Sketch map in colored ink on paper, showing towns, waterways and roads, and a railroad.

did.unittitle: "Aged 11" (verso)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Coffin, Sarah E. Map showing counties in the lower part of the state and showing the territories of the Chickasaw and Choctaw Indians. In these territories, a missionary station, agencies, and villages are represented. Colored ink on paper.

did.unittitle: North Carolina
"Dempsey L. Sumner bought of Thos. H. Cross..."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gates Co. B. P. Baker, Co., Surveyor. Plat in colored ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "A part of 'Farmer's Delight' surveyed for Scott Melton."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gates Co. B. P. Baker, Co., Surveyor. Colored ink on linen.

did.unittitle: "A Section of 'Farmer's Delight' cut for John E. Folk."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gates Co. B. P. Baker, Co., Surveyor. Ink on paper.

did.unittitle: "Portion of 'Farmer's Delight'...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gates Co. B. P. Baker, Co., Surveyor. Plat in colored in linen.

did.unittitle: "This map of Durham as I remembered in 1867-1868...."
did.physdesc: 59 x 75 cm. Reproduction copy included (58 x 59 cm.).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Blount, Lewis. Showing properties, R. F. Morris Tobacco factory, and other sites noted by numbers coordinated with list on the map. Ink on paper.

did.unittitle: Map of roads in Orange, Wake, Johnston, Nash, Edgecomb, Halifax, Franklin, Warren, Granville, and Person Counties

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: K. L. Colored ink on paper mounted on board.

did.unittitle: Map showing towns, roads, a railroad, and county seats in Randolph, Chatham, Orange, Guilford, Alamance, Rockingham, Person, and Caswell counties

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: K.L. Map showing towns, roads, a railroad, and county seats in Randolph, Chatham, Orange, Guilford, Alamance, Rockingham, Person, and Caswell counties possibly around 1865. Ink on paper mounted on board.

did.unittitle: Map primarily showing land of Louis John H. Livermore

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gates Co. Ink on linen.

did.unittitle: South Carolina
"Plan of five hundred and twenty four acres situate on Beach Hill, St. Paul's parish..."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ink on linen, with green border.

did.unittitle: "Plan of one hundred acres of land on Beach Hill of St. Paul's parish. Cobleton Dis't...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jayne, Robert K. Ink on linen, with green border.

did.unittitle: "Beaufort District, So. Ca."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Map showing the coast, islands and Savannah. Pencil on paper.

did.unittitle: Virginia
"Map of south central Virginia...."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Map of south central Virginia, primarily Henry, Franklin, Bedford, Pittsylvania, Campbell, Appomattox, Prince Edwards, Lunenberg, Charlotte, and Mecklenburg Counties showing railroads, and coal and iron deposits. Ink and watercolors on paper.

did.unittitle: "The Metropolitan Line Washington to Augusta, Ga."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ink on paper.

did.unittitle: West Virginia
"Plat of Bennett & Wallace Lands in Gilmer, Braxton & Calhoun Counties West Virginia."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shows roads, railroad, and waterways. Colored ink and watercolors on linen.
